definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Last Saturday, there was a scary movie on TV.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期六，电视上演了一部恐怖电影。

sentences.english: At that time the scene is no worse than a horror film.
sentences.chinese: 当时的场景丝毫不逊于恐怖电影。

sentences.english: The horror movie was very  frightening.
sentences.chinese: 这部恐怖电影很吓人的。

sentences.english: Last night we watched a scary movie and none of us was able to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上我们看了一部恐怖电影，谁也没睡着觉。

sentences.english: I love horror movies. Because I think it is the most exciting for me. This is me.
sentences.chinese: 还喜欢恐怖电影，因为我认为它们是最令人兴奋的。

sentences.english: We're ready to show a low budget one day, quicky, horror movie.
sentences.chinese: 我们准备拍一部经济的，为期一天的恐怖电影。

sentences.english: Rip off as many samples from horror movies as possible to use in your extreme album. Copyright is for pussies .
sentences.chinese: 从恐怖电影中抄袭尽量多的片断用在你的极端专辑中。

sentences.english: He paled at the sight of the scary movie.
sentences.chinese: 他看到这部恐怖电影时，吓得面无血色。

sentences.english: Do you dare watch scary movies with me tonight?
sentences.chinese: 那你今晚敢跟我看恐怖电影吗？

sentences.english: I get spookedfrom ghost stories and scary movies.
sentences.chinese: 我被鬼故事和恐怖电影吓着了。

sentences.english: This doesn’t happen only in horror movies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人以为这只会发生在恐怖电影中。

sentences.english: Jane has a morbid interest in horror films.
sentences.chinese: 简对于恐怖电影有变态的爱好。

sentences.english: The horror movie is so scary. It made his hair stand on end.
sentences.chinese: 这个恐怖电影特别吓人，吓得他头皮发麻。

sentences.english: I saw a horror movie last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚刚看了部恐怖电影。

sentences.english: Watching horror movies gives me the willies.
sentences.chinese: 看恐怖电影让我毛骨悚然。

sentences.english: Why are you scared of horror movies? None of them are real.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖电影把我吓得屁滚尿流。

definition: American TV series/abbr. for 美國電視劇|美国电视剧
